creator: hpaul@4info.net
text:
I am getting Tidy parser errors for the following search strings.These search
strings were executed via Jmeter automation tool against the website
http://wap.test.4info.net

NBA standings
	Tidy Parser errors:   6 (allowed 0) Tidy Parser warnings: 6 (allowed 0)

wallpaper porsche
	Tidy Parser errors:   0 (allowed 0) Tidy Parser warnings: 1 (allowed 0)

standings new york
	Tidy Parser errors:   3 (allowed 0) Tidy Parser warnings: 3 (allowed 0)

standings calgary
	Tidy Parser errors:   1 (allowed 0) Tidy Parser warnings: 1 (allowed 0)

nba standings
	Tidy Parser errors:   6 (allowed 0) Tidy Parser warnings: 6 (allowed 0)

standings den
	Tidy Parser errors:   1 (allowed 0) Tidy Parser warnings: 1 (allowed 0)

STANDINGS NBA
	Tidy Parser errors:   6 (allowed 0) Tidy Parser warnings: 6 (allowed 0)

STANDINGS NORTHWEST
	Tidy Parser errors:   2 (allowed 0) Tidy Parser warnings: 2 (allowed 0)

NBA WESTERN CONFERENCE STANDINGS
	Tidy Parser errors:   3 (allowed 0) Tidy Parser warnings: 3 (allowed 0)

NBA WEST STANDINGS
	Tidy Parser errors:   3 (allowed 0) Tidy Parser warnings: 3 (allowed 0)

ATLANTIC STANDINGS
	Tidy Parser errors:   2 (allowed 0) Tidy Parser warnings: 2 (allowed 0)

preview Ohio State Buckeyes
	Tidy Parser errors:   0 (allowed 0) Tidy Parser warnings: 2 (allowed 0)

WALLPAPER BASEBALL
	Tidy Parser errors:   0 (allowed 0) Tidy Parser warnings: 1 (allowed 0)

NHL standings
	Tidy Parser errors:   6 (allowed 0) Tidy Parser warnings: 6 (allowed 0)

STANDING NHL ATLANTIC
	Tidy Parser errors:   1 (allowed 0) Tidy Parser warnings: 1 (allowed 0)

STANDING NHL ATLANTIC
	Tidy Parser errors:   1 (allowed 0) Tidy Parser warnings: 1 (allowed 0)

STANDING NHL EASTERN
	Tidy Parser errors:   3 (allowed 0) Tidy Parser warnings: 3 (allowed 0)

NHL standings
	Tidy Parser errors:   6 (allowed 0) Tidy Parser warnings: 6 (allowed 0)

STANDINGS MAGIC NBA
	Tidy Parser errors:   1 (allowed 0) Tidy Parser warnings: 1 (allowed 0)

creator: sebb@apache.org
text:
I'm not sure what you want done about this, nor indeed what you were doing to 
cause this error.

The Tidy parser is a 3rd party library, so all we can do is tweak the way it 
is used in JMeter.
